p: Berberine is an important phytoconstituent of plants utilized in different traditional medicine systems, including the Chinese system of traditional medicine (Huang et al., 2011). In their work “Berberine: Botanical Occurrence, Traditional Uses, Extraction Methods, and Relevance in Cardiovascular, Metabolic, Hepatic, and Renal Disorders” Neag et al. review diverse biomedical information on berberine, including several chromatographic techniques for berberine extraction and quantification.
